DOC.brief_summary: Hemodialysis patient low bone density ( total hip T-score < -2.5 ) assign receive teriparatide ( histologic confirmation adynamic bone disease ) ibandronate ( subject increase osteoclast number bone biopsy ) . Follow-up period : one year . A second bone biopsy end study .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Ibandronate Teriparatide Therapy Bone Histology Biochemical Indices Patients Hemodialysis With Low Bone Mineral Density
DOC.criteria: Bone mineral density ( Tscore < 2.5 ) Adynamic bone disease teriparatide group Increased osteoclast number bone biopsy ( high turnover ) ibandronate group Calcium great 8.1 mg/dl Suspected carcinoma Unstable clinical setting
